existing_features.title: Add a pricing configuration screen or modal that allows the app owner to set a price for their app before publishing it live to the App Market. The price input should support common currency formats (e.g., USD), include a clearly labeled affordable pricing tier suggestion (e.g., free, $0.99, $1.99, $4.99), and display the selected price prominently before confirming the go-live action.

new_feature_requests.summary: Ability to set a price for the app when publishing to the App Market
Store the configured app price in the backend so it persists across sessions. Expose a method to set the price and a method to retrieve the current price.
